allowance(address,address).details: Returns the allowance of a spender for an owner

approve(address,uint256).details: Approve a spender to spend tokens on behalf of the caller

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the balance of an account

params._initialSupply: Initial supply to mint to deployer

totalSupply().details: Returns the total supply of tokens

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer tokens from one address to another using allowance
